Title: Metro RPG Character Sheet
Description: A character sheet application for Win 8 (geared towards Pathfinder)
HomeWiki:
Character sheet for pathfinder for WIN 8.

I did a lot of the initial typing for making the DIVs and have made maybe half of the input boxes. Needs a bunch more of the input boxes, it will need the logic to update the calculated fields etc. The work should all be really easy but there is just a lot of it for one person.

I included some GPL fantasy images pulled from Wesnoth (by it is basically impossible to find anything of good quality anywhere else on the net without violating rights; I spent a lot of time looking). I thought it would be nice to put a picture of the character somewhere to give it more personality. Would also come in handy when/if we support multiple character sheets in the app.

Happy hacking.
